markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wings of Air](/Feats.aspx?ID=2600) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=113" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Sylph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=311" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 115 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

You can strain to call forth feathered or cloudy wings from your back. Once manifested, these wings remain for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while you've manifested your wings.

<title level="2">Wings of Air leads to...</title>
[Eternal Wings (Sylph)](/Feats.aspx?ID=2603)
name: Wings of Air
